about_the_game:
Summary:
Ziggy wakes up in a blackout haze in the fictional Swedish suburb ‘Orten’ and quickly discovers he’s caught in a time loop. He’ll have to puzzle through each day in real-time to explore the ancient caves and tunnels twisting beneath his neighborhood, uncover millenia-old mysteries, and ultimately save his city.



About This Game:

Welcome to Orten!

You’ll play as Ziggy, an unambitious everyday teenager who wakes up clueless after a blackout. He has no idea as to what’s happened to him the night before and – what’s worse – soon discovers he’s stuck in a Groundhog Day-esque time loop, with every morning giving way to the same day, again and again…



The Mysteries Below

Who are the Midnight Council? What did the miners in Orten discover in its gravel pits 40 years prior? Is there more to Ziggy’s surroundings, and his predicament, than meets the eye?

You’ll make your way into the twisting tunnels and caves beneath the city in search of the answers you’ll need to break out of the time loop and unravel the supernatural.




A Dynamic World

In Orten, events unfold in real-time, with NPC’s carrying out their routines over the course of repeating 12-minute days. These characters will repeat their behaviors in exactly the same way each day… unless of course you do something to alter their circumstances and change their path.

You’ll need to solve puzzles, make use of hidden passages and hiding spots, and converse with the various inhabitants of Orten. Someone, or something, must have the answers you seek…



Put on your tinfoil hat and get to exploring the mysterious world of Orten!
